content.description: This line climbs a series of slopey jug huecos to a commiting gaston move and cross over high off the deck.  An amazing find only done (I'm guessing) in 2008.
content.location: The route is directly behind Ghetto Simulator about 25 yards.  Hike down around the based of GS and proceed around the corner.  It will be on your left.

content.description:
The crux is doing a traverse after getting established on a good jug.  Took much cleaning and is not the best rock quality,  but the line is obvious and the holds that are there are quality.   

  Begins low down on a sloper and does a move to a good right hand sidepull and do a large lunged to a good hueco cut jug.  Match and cross to slopey hueco.  Heel toe cam in the jug and reach out and rigth to a crimpy undercling.  Rock over on your left foot and find a smearing right foot.  Pop into the undercling at the top of the juggy hueco and lunch out left for a slopey jug.  Easy top out.   

  Two stars for the holds and movement.  Negative two for the death landing and crumbly rock although I'm sure this will clean up with traffic and time.  So a potential 3-star line that as of the time of this posting hasn't had a 2nd Ascent.
content.protection: Two pads, two spotters.  Bloody landing.
content.location: 25 yards down and slightly right towards ground level from the starting holds of Ghetto Simulator.

climbs.name: Ghetto Simulator
climbs.fa: Matt Samet, Pete Zoller, Scott Leonard  December 1991/January 1992

content.description: A very, very long climb with a cruxy finish. Amazing line though, everyone should do this climb when visiting Hueco! This is a very long climb, but not too tall because an angling ramp follows you the whole way up.
content.location: This climb follows a line of chalked heucos and holds up and left, you can start sitting or standing. The problem faces uphill in a slot that opens to the problems left.

content.description: An amazing area that is usually pretty crowded because of the climb Ghetto Simulator that is on it. Ghetto Simulator is possibly the best climb of it's grade in the park.
